message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.AI, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the security issues in IoT devices and proposes a network-based algorithm for detecting Mirai or similar malware infected bots in large-scale networks. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and network security (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the optimization of computational resources, which can be related to topics in systems and artificial intelligence (cs.SI, cs.AI). The proposed algorithm involves packet traffic analysis, which can be related to data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
